headline.main: Spring Threats; TURKEY PREPARES FOR THE FUTURE

lead_paragraph: The Spring has been traditionally Adolf Hitler's time. It was on March 7, 1936, that he sent German troops into the Rhineland in violation of the Treaty of Versailles. It was on March 12, 1938, that he rode triumphantly into his native Austria. A year later, March 15, he slept in Prague in the ancient palace of the Bohemian kings.
abstract: eds on German occupation, and the isles of Greece
